include.condition: Window.Isactive(radiochannels) | Window.IsActive(tvchannels) | Window.IsActive(tvguide) | Window.IsActive(tvrecordings) | Window.IsActive(tvtimers) | Window.IsActive(tvsearch)

value.condition: [Control.IsVisible(523) | Control.IsVisible(525) | [Control.IsVisible(526) + Skin.HasSetting(View526_DisableFanArt) + Skin.HasSetting(View_526_nofooterbar)] | [Control.IsVisible(527) + Skin.HasSetting(View527_DisableFanArt)]] | [Window.IsActive(Home) + Skin.String(HomeLayout, netflix2)] | [Window.IsVisible(movieinformation) + Skin.HasSetting(UseNetflixInfoDialog)]

control.label: $INFO[ListItem.label]
control.visible: ![Window.IsActive(Videos) | Window.IsActive(videoplaylist)] | ListItem.IsCollection | String.IsEmpty(ListItem.VideoAspect) | Skin.String(mediaflagsstyle,disabled) | Skin.String(mediaflagsstyle,classic) | String.IsEmpty(Control.GetLabel(884))

control.description: RSS Feed Normal - normal or touch with disabled battery
RSS Feed Normal or Classic - With touch buttons enabled
